books.author: by Anderson Cooper and Gloria Vanderbilt
books.description: Mother and son discuss their relationship and difficult family history.
books.name: THE RAINBOW COMES AND GOES

books.author: by Angela Duckworth
books.description: A psychologist argues that passion and perseverance are the keys to success.
books.name: GRIT

books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by Lin-Manuel Miranda and Jeremy McCarter
books.description: The libretto of the Grammy- and Pulitzer Prize-winning musical, annotated by its creator, along with backstage photos, a production history and interviews with the cast.
books.name: HAMILTON: THE REVOLUTION

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary, a major author of the Federalist Papers and an advocate of strong central government. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway musical.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: by Clinton Romesha
books.description: The deadly 13-hour battle for a remote combat outpost in Afghanistan in 2009, by a soldier who received the Medal of Honor for his role.
books.name: RED PLATOON

books.author: by Ron Miscavige with Dan Koon
books.description: The father of Scientology’s leader criticizes his management of the organization.
books.name: RUTHLESS

books.author: by Phil Knight
books.description: A memoir by the founder of Nike.
books.name: SHOE DOG

books.author: by Lesley Stahl
books.description: he reporter investigates how “grandmothering” transforms a woman’s life.
books.name: BECOMING GRANDMA

books.author: by Clint Hill with Lisa McCubbin
books.description: A retired Secret Service agent discusses his experience with presidents from Eisenhower to Ford.
books.name: FIVE PRESIDENTS

books.author: by James Stone
books.description: An executive and philanthropist identifiess five domestic policy problems and proposes solutions.
books.name: FIVE EASY THESES

books.author: by David McCullough
books.description: The story of the bicycle mechanics from Ohio who ushered in the age of flight.
books.name: THE WRIGHT BROTHERS

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Arianna Huffington
books.description: What scientific research reveals about the dangers of sleep deprivation, and tips for achieving better sleep habits. By the founder of The Huffington Post.
books.name: THE SLEEP REVOLUTION

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: The last voyage of the Lusitania, the passenger liner sunk by a German torpedo in 1915; by the author of “The Devil in the White City.”
books.name: DEAD WAKE
